job_description:
Company: TechCorp
Position: QA Engineer
Location: San Jose, CA
Salary: $90,000 - $120,000

About Us:
TechCorp is a global technology company that develops innovative software solutions. We are committed to quality and customer satisfaction. Help us deliver world-class software.

Job Description:
We are seeking a QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our software products. The ideal candidate will have experience with manual and automated testing techniques.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute test plans and test cases.
- Identify and report software defects.
- Participate in test automation efforts.
- Collaborate with developers to resolve issues.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 1+ years of experience in QA testing.
- Experience with manual and automated testing techniques.
- Familiarity with bug tracking systems.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Selenium or other test automation tools.
- Experience with performance testing.

Benefits:
- Employee stock purchase plan.
- 401(k) matching.
- Paid holidays.
